title: Feature: Replace PDF slides by matching headers
description:
Add functionality to replace specific slides in a PDF when markdown headers match slide titles. This requires:
- CLI flag (e.g., --replace-mode)
- PDF text extraction (using pdfplumber or PyMuPDF)
- Parse markdown for ## headers
- Match header text to slide titles
- Replace matched pages while preserving others
- More complex than append - requires page-level manipulation

title: Feature: Append markdown to existing PDF
description:
Add functionality to append pages from a markdown file to an existing PDF file. This requires:
- CLI argument for input PDF file
- PDF manipulation library (pypdf or PyPDF2)
- Read existing PDF, convert markdown to PDF, merge them
- Output combined PDF
